attributes.action: Disregard the petition, "EU Referendum Rules triggering a 2nd EU Referendum"
attributes.additional_details:
The EU referendum received the highest turnout at any election/referendum in 24 years. The last election to receive such a high turnout was in 1992.

Leave/Out won by a margin of over 1 million votes. We vote together as one United Kingdom. Calling for 2nd referendums because London voted IN is ludicrous.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to disregard the current open petition, "EU Referendum Rules triggering a 2nd EU Referendum" calling for a 2nd referendum. We call on the Government to accept the democratic result of the referendum to leave the EU.
